channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Former General Services Administration employees receive reinstatement offers
item.description: Hundreds of employees from the General Services Administration have received offers to return to their jobs after being fired this year.

item.title: The Left Accuses The Right Of Hate To Avoid Debate And Silence Opposition
item.description: Conservatives' views on marriage, transgenderism, abortion, race, and more are based on reason, science, economics, and the Bible — not hate.

item.title: Jimmy Kimmel, Unrepentant Liar
item.description: Kimmel’s return suggests that he has learned nothing and will do it again.

item.title: Gen Z’s hiring nightmare is really about discrimination. ‘Youngism’ is worse than AI when it comes to eating entry-level jobs
item.description: In the U.S., federal age-bias protections under the Age Discrimination in Employment Act begin at 40, which leaves Gen Z in a legal blind spot.
